    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class CublasPointer
extends Pointer
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Wraps the allocation and freeing of resources on a cuda device

    • Constructor Detail

      • CublasPointer

        public CublasPointer(JCudaBuffer buffer)
        Creates a CublasPointer for a given JCudaBuffer
        Parameters:
        buffer -

      • CublasPointer

        public CublasPointer(INDArray array)
        Creates a CublasPointer for a given INDArray. This wrapper makes sure that the INDArray offset, stride and memory pointers are accurate to the data being copied to and from the device. If the copyToHost function is used in in this class, the host buffer offset and data length is taken care of automatically
        Parameters:
        array -
